scripts.minify: npx --no-install uglifyjs-folder --log-level warning -x .js ./scripts/ -eo ./scripts/ && terser main.js --compress --mangle --output main.js
scripts.complete_compile: npm run typescript_compile && npm run sass_compile && npm run minify
scripts.build_macOS: npm run complete_compile && npm run build_app_macOS
scripts.build_win: npm run complete_compile && npm run build_app_win
scripts.build_linux: npm run complete_compile && npm run build_app_linux
scripts.build_all: npm run complete_compile && npm run build_app_win && npm run build_app_macOS && npm run build_app_linux
